description: Create, update, and delete MCP 1.0 & 2.0 networks

service_plan.description: The service plan, either “ESSENTIALS” or “ADVANCED”. MCP 2.0 Only.

mcp_user.description: The username used to authenticate to the CloudControl API. If not specified, will fall back to C(MCP_USER) from environment variable or C(~/.dimensiondata).

wait_poll_interval.description: The amount of time (in seconds) to wait between checks for task completion. Only applicable if I(wait=true).

mcp_password.description: The password used to authenticate to the CloudControl API. If not specified, will fall back to C(MCP_PASSWORD) from environment variable or C(~/.dimensiondata). Required if I(mcp_user) is specified.

name.description: The name of the network domain to create.

wait_time.description: The maximum amount of time (in seconds) to wait for the task to complete. Only applicable if I(wait=true).

state.description: Should the resource be present or absent.

wait.description: Should we wait for the task to complete before moving onto the next.

validate_certs.description: If C(false), SSL certificates will not be validated. This should only be used on private instances of the CloudControl API that use self-signed certificates.

description.description: Additional description of the network domain.
